title: Arms race: where do we stand?
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/North Atlantic Treaty Organization

description: Presented by Richard Morecroft, this thought-provoking program examines the important social issue of the arms race. Covers such topics as: the Maralinga tests, NATO and the Warsaw Pact, nuclear stockpiles, Australia's defence forces policy, costs of war and the peace movement.
